column4: hey, I'm getting the error in this pastebin http://paste.ubuntu.com/572889/ and I know that it works on my home network (visiting relatives) so I don't know what could be going on other than it might be a DHCP prob.
anyone know why I'm not able to update? I've posted the pastebin with the error I get.
not trying to be rude, btw.
could I see the pastebin link?
